component.name: listUpcomingWebinars
component.description: Returns webinars scheduled for the future for a specified organizer.

component.name: getWebinarById
component.description: Retrieve information on a specific webinar.

component.name: getAllWebinars
component.description: Returns webinars scheduled for the future for a specified organizer.

component.name: getAttendeesForAllWebinarSessions
component.description: Returns all attendees for all sessions of the specified webinar.

component.name: getAudioInformation
component.description: Retrieves the audio/conferencing information for a specific webinar.

component.name: updateAudioInformation
component.description: Updates the audio/conferencing settings for a specific webinar.

component.name: getWebinarMeetingTimes
component.description: Retrieves the meeting times for a webinar.

component.name: getWebinarPanelists
component.description: Retrieves all the panelists for a specific webinar.

component.name: createPanelists
component.description: Create panelists for a specified webinar.

component.name: getPerformanceForAllWebinarSessions
component.description: Gets performance details for all sessions of a specific webinar.
